chicken.description: Grilled or fried chicken pieces with golden brown skin

meat.description: Cooked meat pieces or slices, brown to dark brown

fish.description: Fried or grilled fish fillet, light golden to white

rice.description: White or yellow steamed rice, loose grains

bread.description: Flatbread or pita, round with light brown spots

pasta.description: Pasta noodles with sauce, typically pale yellow or red-coated

salad.description: Mixed green salad with vegetables, colorful medley

hummus.description: Smooth beige dip in a bowl, often with olive oil drizzle

fries.description: Golden yellow fried potato strips, crispy surface

soup.description: Liquid dish in a bowl, often with visible chunks or herbs

juice.description: Colorful liquid beverage in a glass or cup

dessert.description: Sweet dish, often decorated with cream, syrup, or powdered sugar
